MfgProgramTemplateItem.name: MfgProgramTemplateItem
MfgProgramTemplateItem.description: Represents information about the transformation type associated with a manufacturing program template.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the transformation.

ContextDefinition.description: The context definition that defines how data is mapped and transformed to the target object, such as an opportunity or account.

Description.description: The description of the manufacturing program template item.

MfgProgramTemplateId.description: The manufacturing program template associated with the template item.

SourceContextMappingName.description: The context mapping that defines how data is mapped from a list of facts(Input Data) to create structured information.

TargetContextMappingName.description: The context mapping that defines how the structured data is saved to the target object, such as an opportunity or sales agreement.

TemplateItemName.description: The name of the manufacturing program template item.

TransformationDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the transformation in the manufacturing program template.
